Item.Value: [Text:Hi there, $Character_14$'s my name and I'm the mason here in town. You're moving into the abandoned Manor right? Come get me when you're ready to start renovating. I also sell building materials if you find yourself short.]
[Text:Hey, $Name$, you don't happen to need any new weapons, do you? I've got a few at the shop that I think could come in handy.][Default]
[Text:Oh, hello $Name$, What can I do for you? {{Talk-Talk|Gift-GiveGift|Buy Items-BuyItems|Never Mind-Cancel}}]

[Text:Wow, you did that already? Great. Now any travelers that pass through will have a place to stay. This is it, $Name$. This is the first real step we take to rebuiling $Town$. We're going to need money though. I've got some thinking to do...][Face:Happy][SendMessage:0]

[Text:$Name$! I'm glad to see you. So, I've been thinking... I've just about finished witht he plans I brought with me. If I'm going to design any more buildings, I'm going to need a place to work. Could you build this for me?][Once][Priority:50][RequiredBuildingID:8][UnlockBuildingID:6]
